about_the_game:
I've wanted to make my own Rock'n'Roll Racing game since I was a kid.
Now I'm making it, just 'cause I Can!
What will you do to me - i'm in another city! XD

Key features:
  • Buy a car. Upgrade it.
  • Race multiple tracks!
  • Fight your way to the 1st place!
  • You have (for now) "6 Barrels of Awesomeness" Minigun, Homing Missiles, Land Mines, Front Bumper Spikes, Nitro Boost and 5 wheels (+ steering one)!
  • Listen to Awesome Music!
  • Be happy!

I'll try to make it as fun as it can be!
You may help me with it by playtesting it and giving me a feedback in the game's Steam community or in my social networks.
I'll be very greatfull if you'll record your playthrough with your commentaries and send the youtube link to me.

Make the Battle Racing Games Great Again!

"Gonochki" means diminutive form of "Racing" in Russian, btw.

name: [Gonochki] Cars, Guns and Metal!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win10
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Fast paced Arcade Battle Racing game highly inspired by the legendary Rock'n'Roll Racing!
